akn:section.akn:heading: Tupelo National Battlefield; acquisition of additional lands

akn:content.akn:p: § 429a–1. Tupelo National Battlefield; acquisition of additional lands To further the purposes of sections 429 and 429a of this title, the Secretary of the Interior may acquire by donation or with donated funds not to exceed one-half acre of land and interests in land for addition to the adjoining Tupelo National Battlefield site. (Pub. L. 87–133, § 1, Aug. 10, 1961, 75 Stat. 336.)
